attributes.action: I invite Syrian refugees to live in my house.
attributes.additional_details: “I propose that we personally take in one or two refugees to live with us, until they are offered a humane, individual accommodation instead of being quartered in mass accommodation."
attributes.background:
Allow families with young children to enter UK, so they're able to live like human beings. 
Tens of thousands of Syrians fleeing the war in their homeland have descended on Turkey's Aegean coast this summer to board boats to Greece, their gateway to the European Union.

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/106997

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
